Texto: 
increased intensity of spine, femora, tibiae, fibulae, radii, ulnae and carpal bones on tc99m total body bone scan.
hypertrophic osteoarthropathy
metastatic disease
multiple pathologic fractures
paget's disease
61y/o white male with h/o lung cancer with diffuse bone pain and arthralgias.
